plugins.contactsPermission: $(PRODUCT_NAME) requires contact permissions to add individuals to your emergency contact list, enabling direct and swift communication for sending critical updates if situations arise. Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your contacts.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: $(PRODUCT_NAME) needs your location to ensure safety through live tracking, sending critical updates, and auto-check-ins, connecting you instantly with help when it matters most. Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to use your location.
plugins.locationAlwaysPermission: $(PRODUCT_NAME) needs your location to ensure safety through live tracking, sending critical updates, and auto-check-ins, connecting you instantly with help when it matters most. Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to use your location.
plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: $(PRODUCT_NAME) needs your location to ensure safety through live tracking, sending critical updates, and auto-check-ins, connecting you instantly with help when it matters most. Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to use your location.

infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: $(PRODUCT_NAME) requires contact permissions to add individuals to your emergency contact list, enabling direct and swift communication for sending critical updates if situations arise. Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your contacts.
